dimensions.name: Academic Performance

scoring_guide.90-100: Exceptional: >3.8 GPA with rigorous coursework, strong upward trajectory
scoring_guide.80-89: Strong: 3.5-3.8 GPA, solid course selection, consistent performance
scoring_guide.70-79: Good: 3.0-3.5 GPA, moderate rigor, general competence
scoring_guide.60-69: Adequate: <3.0 GPA, basic coursework, some inconsistency

bias_avoidance: Do not penalize lack of AP/honors if not offered
Evaluate trajectory, not just absolute GPA
Do not assume school quality from location

dimensions.name: Test Scores
criteria: Balance between verbal and quantitative sections
bias_avoidance: Consider best score if multiple attempts
Do not penalize test-optional or limited access

dimensions.name: Achievements

scoring_guide.90-100: Exceptional: National/international recognition, significant measurable impact
scoring_guide.80-89: Strong: Regional recognition, demonstrated leadership with clear outcomes
scoring_guide.70-79: Good: School-level achievements, active participation, some leadership
scoring_guide.60-69: Adequate: Some participation, limited formal recognition

bias_avoidance: Do not favor expensive programs (international travel, paid camps)
Value grassroots initiatives and local impact

dimensions.name: Essay Quality

scoring_guide.90-100: Exceptional: Profound insights, compelling and original narrative, exceptional intellectual engagement
scoring_guide.80-89: Strong: Clear and thoughtful reasoning, genuine reflection, good depth
scoring_guide.70-79: Good: Coherent ideas, adequate depth, competent self-awareness
scoring_guide.60-69: Adequate: Basic competence, limited depth or originality
scoring_guide.below-60: Needs improvement: Superficial or unclear thinking

bias_avoidance: Evaluate content and reasoning, not writing style
Do not penalize non-native expression patterns
Do not favor specific cultural narrative styles
Focus on quality of ideas, not linguistic fluency

evaluation_rules: Evaluate what applicant achieved with available opportunities
Do not penalize lack of privileged access

output_requirements.reasoning_guidelines: 2-3 sentences per dimension with specific evidence
